description.en:
Eitoku Academy is a school that caters to children and from rich, high-society families. Hence, Makino, who comes from a poor family, is considered by others as the "weed" of the school. The school is ruled by the "Flower Four" group, more commonly known as the F4. The F4 leader, and son of the wealthiest, most powerful family in Japan, Domyouji Tsukasa, takes an interest in Tsukushi because she is the only girl at Eitoku who does not fawn over him. However, his hot-headed nature and bullying ways are originally a major turn-off for Tsukushi, who has her sights set on Rui Hanazawa.  
  
Volume 37 is comprised of three short stories that happen after the ending

After he’s killed by the righteous leader of his own guild, Woojin gets a chance to start over. This time he’s not interested in saving the world from monsters — he’s got his sights set on revenge! 

His high-level kills quickly garner him notoriety among the game plebs, while boosting his stats as he masterminds his way closer to the top. But there's something no one can figure out: whose side he’s playing for. 

Now that he knows how to play to win, Woojin will stop at nothing to destroy the hero!
description.ja:
ある日、世界はゲームのように変わってしまった。 世界各地に「ダンジョン」が現れそこから「モンスター」が溢れ、特別な力を持つ「プレイヤー」が登場した。 孤独に生きていたウジンはメシアギルドのマスター・セジュンに出会い、初めて仲間たちと希望を持てるようになった。 しかし、彼の本当の姿は英雄ではなかった… 裏切られ殺されたウジンが目覚めるとそこはそこは自分が「プレイヤー」として覚醒する前の過去だった。 復讐のため「暗黒世界の代理者」の力を得て次々とレベルアップしていくき… 新たなダークヒーローがここに誕生する！

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%82%AC-%EB%8D%94-%ED%9E%88%EC%96%B4%EB%A1%9C/2376)
---

- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Kill_the_Hero/191)
description.ko:
어느 날, 세상이 게임처럼 변해버렸다.
도시 한복판에 '던전'과 '몬스터'가 출몰했고,
신들의 권능을 받은 '플레이어'들이 등장했다. 

 이세준. 세상을 구원할 메시아 길드의 수장.
"저와 함께 세상을 구합시다. 이 악몽에 종지부를 찍읍시다."
영웅의 등장에 온 세상이 열광했고,
나는 그의 동료가 되었다. 

 하지만……

 인류가 구세주로 떠받들던 그는 영웅이 아니라,
세상을 지배하고자 야욕을 품었던 간웅이었다.
“그동안 수고했다. 네가 아니었다면 여기까지 올 수 없었겠지.”
최후의 던전에서 나는 그 놈의 칼에 목숨을 잃었다.

 …라고 생각했다.

 죽음의 순간, 내 귓가에 들려온 알림음.
[게임을 시작합니다.]
나는 플레이어로 각성하기 전의 과거로 되돌아 왔다.

 그리고 이제는, 내가 놈을……

 '사냥' 할 차례다.

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%82%AC-%EB%8D%94-%ED%9E%88%EC%96%B4%EB%A1%9C/2376)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/66181)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Kill_the_Hero/191)
description.ru:
Этот мир не был милосерден, и я отвечал ему столь же искренней ненавистью. Когда он стал Игрой, для меня не изменилось ничего. Однако встреча с Ли Сэ-Чжуном – героем, Воином, членом самой почитаемой из гильдий – дала мне дом, товарищей и смысл жизни. Смыслом этим стало – уничтожить эти чертовы подземелья и закончить Игру! Я умер от меча в спину. От меча того, кому верил, у врат последнего подземелья… Теперь я вернулся и знаю точно, кто станет добычей «охотничьего пса» Ким У-Джина, чего бы мне это ни стоило!

---

description.de:
Im Alter von acht Jahren verlor Ijin Yoo seine Eltern bei einem Flugzeugabsturz und strandete in einem fremden Land, wo er gezwungen war, ein Kindersöldner zu werden, um zu überleben. Zehn Jahre später kehrt er nach Hause zurück, um mit seiner Familie in Korea wieder vereint zu sein. Dort scheint alles friedlich zu sein, doch schon bald muss Ijin feststellen, dass das Leben als Teenager eine ganz andere Art des Überlebens ist. Da ihm nur noch ein Jahr in der Oberschule bleibt, muss Ijin neue Taktiken erlernen, um sich auf dem Schlachtfeld der Schule zurechtzufinden. Kann er ein Jahr Oberschule überleben? Oder wird die Schule vielmehr in der Lage sein, IHN zu überleben?

---
Die Geschichte handelt von einem jungen Koreaner, der bei einem Flugzeugabsturz seine Eltern verloren hat. Das Kind landet irgendwie in einem vom Krieg zerrissenen Teil der Welt und wird zu einem Top-Söldner im Teenageralter. Irgendwie findet er seine Familie wieder und beschließen, ein ruhiges Leben mit seiner Familie zu führen.

---

description.en:
At the age of eight, Ijin Yu lost his parents in a plane crash and became stranded in a foreign land, forced to become a child mercenary in order to stay alive. 

He returns home ten years later to be reunited with his family in Korea, where food and shelter are plenty and everything seems peaceful. But Ijin will soon learn that life as a teenager is a whole other feat of survival. With only one year of high school left, Ijin must master new tactics to maneuver his way around the schoolhouse battleground.

Can he survive a year of high school? Or rather, will the school be able to survive him?
description.es:
A los ocho años, Ijin Yu perdió a sus padres en un accidente aéreo y quedó varado en un país extranjero, forzado a convertirse en mercenario para sobrevivir. Diez años después, regresa a su hogar para reunirse con su familia en Corea, en donde sobra la comida y todo parece estar en paz. Sin embargo, Ijin pronto descubrirá que la vida de adolescente es otro tipo de supervivencia. En su último año de secundaria, Ijin debe dominar nuevas tácticas para resistir en el campo de batalla escolar. ¿Podrá sobrevivir a su último año? ¿O podrá su escuela sobrevivir a él?

---

description.en: Pania Elarona, an average elf with the special ability to see people's status windows, idolizes the infamous lone wolf Naos Shalia. When a new law forbids solo dungeon adventuring, she volunteers to pair up with him. Reluctantly, Naos agrees, but a hidden lust demon curse triggers in the dungeon, trapping him in a passionate haze! Pania checks his status window, and a mission appears saying... he needs to get off?! Can these elves conquer the curse, or will the lust be too strong to overcome?

Reborn as a side character wrongfully accused and executed, Mia resolves to rewrite her fate. Returning to the moment she first met the villainous heroine, she vows to stand tall and fight back, sparking a thrilling rebellion against a fabricated destiny.

In the shadowy heart of Seoul near Cheonggyecheon Stream lies a sinister mansion whose porch only fools would dare tread. Welcome… to the house of the Ki sisters: Jang-nyeo, Sal-gyo, Jae-rim, and Jenny. Homeschooled and raised in isolation, the four sisters and their inadvertently menacing demeanor may strike terror into the faint-hearted, but don’t judge a book by its cover: the youngest, Jenny Ki, is a scary-- I mean, starry-eyed hopeless romantic who’s out to find love! The problem is… everything she knows about love is from romance novels. Will Jenny put the Ki in “kiss” or “kill”?
description.es: En el sombrío corazón de Seúl, cerca del arroyo Cheonggyecheon, se encuentra una siniestra mansión cuyo porche sólo los necios se atreverían a pisar. Bienvenidos... a la casa de las hermanas Ki: Jang-nyeo, Sal-gyo, Jae-rim y Jenny. Educadas en casa y criadas en aislamiento, las cuatro hermanas y su comportamiento inadvertidamente amenazador pueden aterrorizar a los pusilánimes, pero no juzgues un libro por su portada: la más joven, Jenny Ki, es una aterradora... quiero decir, una romántica empedernida con ojos de estrella que está dispuesta a encontrar el amor. El problema es que todo lo que sabe sobre el amor lo ha aprendido en las novelas románticas. ¿Pondrá Jenny Ki «besar» o «matar»?

description.en: The main character’s father passes away. The will states that each of the three siblings receive a portion of the father’s wealth. The main character receives a Porsche Carrera. She doesn’t know what a Porsche Carrera looks like, didn’t know the car company Porsche, can’t drive a manual and had absolutely no interest in cars, at the time.

Я получил читерские способности в другом мире, и стал экстраординарным в реальном мире~ История о том, как повышение уровня изменило мою жизнь.

description.en:
Since a young age, Tenjou Yuuya was continuously bullied.
He is staying in his beloved grandfather's home while he goes to school and, as usual, he receives a harsh bullying, and takes an extended absence from school in order to have some time to heal his wounds.
While on this long time of absence, he takes the opportunity to clean his grandfather's house and finds a room he never had seen before. Due to this being where his grandfather kept many different objects that he gathered from his travels around the world, it needed tidying! While Tenjou was arranging the objects, he found a door, yet it didn't seem to go anywhere since it was standing upright and not attached to any wall.
Out of curiosity, Tenjou opens this door, and what he found on the other side is…

[Official English Light Novel](https://yenpress.com/series/i-got-a-cheat-skill-in-another-world-and-became-unrivaled-in-the-real-world-too-light-novel)
description.pt-br: Tenjo Yuuya sofre bully desde criança. Sua vida se resumia em passar o tempo na casa de seu avô e ir para a escola. Porém, ele sofria uma rotina diária de bully severo em sua escola, algumas vezes o pobre Yuuya se via obrigado a pedir licença para curar suas feridas. Mas em uma dessas licenças, ele acaba descobrindo um armazém de objetos que seu avô guardava, e entre esses objetos estava uma porta misteriosa. E claro, ele abriu a porta, e lá ele encontrou…

altTitles.ja: アイドル辞めるけど結婚してくれますか!?

altTitles.en: Will You Marry Me Because I Quit Being an Idol?

altTitles.pt-br: Estou deixando de ser uma Idol, mas você se casaria comigo!?

altTitles.ja-ro: Idol Yameru kedo Kekkon Shite Kuremasu ka!?

altTitles.vi: Anh Sẽ Kết Hôn Với Em Nếu Em Từ Bỏ Việc Trở Thành Thần Tượng Chứ?

description.en:
Sato Itto, an ordinary salaryman, has been shy about love due to an old trauma. Then one day, a reunion is held for the first time in several years. While they are having a good time talking about the good old days, suddenly Hebo, who has become an idol currently on hiatus, decides to attend the reunion!

Sato is upset to see Hebo, who was his first love. He manages to get over it with the help of alcohol, which he does not normally drink. When he wakes up, he finds the two of them naked in the same bed. As Sato desperately tries to recall his memories, Hebo shockingly says to him...!

"Marry me..."

What will happen to the marriage between the two who have no experience with love...!?
description.ja:
いたって普通のサラリーマンの佐藤一途（さとういっと）は昔のトラウマで恋に奥手になっていた。そんなある日、数年ぶりに同窓会が開かれることに。昔話に花を咲かせていると、急にアイドル休止ほやほやの枦保（へぼ）さんが出席することに!? 初恋の人だった枦保さんを前に動揺する佐藤。普段の飲まないお酒の力を借りてなんとか乗り切るも目を覚ますと同じベッドに裸の二人。必死に記憶を思い出そうとする佐藤に枦保さんから衝撃の一言が…！

「結婚して…」

恋愛偏差値0同士の結婚の行方は果たして―――！？
description.pt-br:
Sato Itto, um assalariado comum, tem sido tímido em relação ao amor devido a um trauma antigo. Então, um dia, uma reunião é realizada pela primeira vez em vários anos. Enquanto eles se divertem conversando sobre os bons e velhos tempos, de repente Hebo, que se tornou uma Idol que está atualmente em hiato, decide participar da reunião!

Sato fica chateado ao ver Hebo, que foi seu primeiro amor. Ele consegue superar isso com a ajuda de álcool, que normalmente não bebe. Quando acorda, encontra os dois nus na mesma cama. Enquanto Sato tenta desesperadamente se lembrar de suas memórias, Hebo lhe diz, de forma chocante...!

“Se case comigo...”

O que acontecerá com o casamento entre os dois que não têm experiência com o amor...?

altTitles.ja: 茜部先生は照れ知らず

description.en:
Kouki Sakieda is an assistant for Akira Akanabe, a manga artist he admires, who always tries to praise him in some way. Sakieda is worried that he will end up falling in love with her if this situation continues. Then Akanabe unexpectedly asks him to go out with her... 

The story depicts the daily life of Akanabe-sensei, who lavishes praise on Sakieda without embarrassment, and Sakieda, who tries to accept it all gracefully.
description.ja: 『崎枝君ってさ私のこと好き？』　憧れの漫画家・茜部アキラのもとでアシスタントとして働く崎枝コウキ。憧れが次第に恋心へと変わっていたある日、まさかの両想いであることがわかり、なんと二人は恋人同士に！　しかし、茜部先生は思った事を口にしちゃう上に照れ知らずで、コウキを褒め殺してくる！
description.pt-br:
Kouki Sakieda é assistente de Akira Akanabe, uma mangaká que ele admira. Ela sempre tenta elogiá-lo de alguma forma. Sakieda está preocupado que possa acabar se apaixonando por ela se essa situação continuar. Então, inesperadamente, Akanabe o convida para sair...
A história retrata o dia a dia da Sensei Akanabe, que distribui elogios a Sakieda sem qualquer constrangimento, e de Sakieda, que tenta aceitar tudo com naturalidade.

altTitles.ja-ro: Ao Ashi

altTitles.th: AOASHI แข้งเด็กหัวใจนักสู้

altTitles.vi: Ao Ashi

description.de: Aoi Ashito ist ein Mittelschüler im dritten Jahr aus Ehime. Hinter seinem rohen Spiel verbirgt sich sein immenses Talent, aber Ashito erleidet wegen seiner allzu geradlinigen Persönlichkeit einen großen Rückschlag. Der Manager der Jugendmannschaft des J1-Clubs Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, erscheint vor Ashito. Fukuda sieht Ashitos grenzenloses Potenzial und lädt ihn ein, an den Probespielen seines Teams in Tokio teilzunehmen. Die Geschichte des Jungen, der den Fußball in Japan revolutionieren wird, beginnt sich schnell zu entfalten.
description.en:
Aoi Ashito is a third year middle school student from Ehime. Behind his raw game hides his immense talent 
but Ashito suffers a huge setback because of his overly straightforward personality. 
One day the youth team manager of J1 club Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, appears in front of him. 
Fukuda sees his limitless potential and invites him to take part in his team's tryouts in Tokyo. 
The story of the boy who will revolutionize football in Japan rapidly begins to unfold.  
  
---
- **Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2019**
description.ru: Ашито Аой, ученик третьего класса средней школы из префектуры Эхиме, встречает тренера «Молодежной лиги J» Фукуду Тацую. Несмотря на свою грубость, Ашито обладает таким удивительным потенциалом, что тренер Фукуда приглашает его принять участие в отборочных тестах своей команды в Токио. Взгляните на историю мальчика, который совершит революцию в японском футболе.
description.tr: Aoi Ashito Ehime'de ortaokul 3. sınıfa giden bir öğrencidir. Bir gün karşısına J1 Ligi kulübü Tokyo City Esperion'un altyapı takımı menajeri Fukuda Tetsuya çıkar. Fukuda Aoi'nin sonsuz potansiyelini farkeder ve onu Tokyo'daki altyapı seçmelerine davet eder. Böylece Japon futbolunda devrim yapacak çocuğun hikayesi başlar.
description.pt-br: Ashito Aoi, um estudante do terceiro ano do ensino médio de Ehime, conhece Fukuda Tatsuya, um treinador da "J Youth League". Mesmo que ainda tenha uma personalidade forte, Ashito tem um incrível potêncial que o fez ser convidado pelo treinador Fukuda para participar da seleção de sua equipe em Tóquio. A história do garoto que vai revolucionar o futebol no Japão vai começar.

title.en: A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal

altTitles.ja: 男女比1:39の平行世界は思いのほか普通

altTitles.ja-ro: Danjohi 1:39 no Heikou Sekai wa Omoi no Hoka Futsuu

altTitles.es-la: Un Mundo Donde 1 Hombre cada 39 Mujeres es lo Normal
El mundo paralelo con una relación de hombres y mujeres de 1:39 resulta ser inesperadamente normal

description.en:
Satou Sou is accidentally swapped with himself in a parallel world with a male/female ratio of 1:39. He finds a kind family and lovely women at the place where he was switched. Seeing the outside of these women, he's relieved to see that the number of men and women has changed, but not much else. However, their inner lives are filled with conflicts and troubles.

---

Alternative version: [A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal 【R18】](https://mangadex.org/title/dcf01405-2bb3-40a4-bd8b-af1eb90c8e8e)
description.ja: 主人公「佐藤 蒼」はひょんなことから男女比1：39の平行世界の自分と入れ替わってしまう。入れ変わった先には、優しい家族や可愛い女性ばかりそんな彼女たちの外面を見て主人公は「男女の数が変化しただけで他はそんなに変わらないな」と安心する。だが、彼女たちの内面では葛藤や煩悩に溢れかえっていた。
description.es-la: Sou Satou, un chico de secundaria que fue transportado a un mundo paralelo. Este mundo resulta ser que la relación de hombres y mujeres es de 1:39, esto quiere decir que por cada 1 hombre en el mundo hay 39 mujeres, sin embargo, parece ser que este nuevo mundo resulta ser inesperadamente ¿normal?...

description.en:
”Is it okay to kill people?"  
A treacherous revenge suspense by Shiryu Nakatake, a newcomer to Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

"Shun, if someone is converted, let him go and do nothing. He should be given a chance to be reborn."  

"Grandpa, I hope he doesn't reincarnate himself."  
In order to defeat several non-human monsters, the boy also became something non-human.  

Shun Uruma, a sixth-grade student, was named "Experimental body: A" by five of his classmates and was severely bullied and lived in hell. His only peace was with his brother, who loved him, and his parents, who protected him…. . until the five monsters killed his family.  

When he finally loses everything and faces true hell, a dark "wish" is born inside Shun. He was reborn under the training of his grandfather, who served in a secret unit during WWII. Now, four years later, he appears in front of his fated enemy.  

"I won't let ANYONE get in the way of my revenge."
description.fr:
"Est-ce que c'est bien de tuer des gens ?"  

Un thriller de vengeance par Shiryu Nakatake, un nouveau venu dans le magazine Bessatsu Shōnen.  

Shun Uruma, un élève de 6ème, a été nommé "Sujet de test A" par cinq de ses camarades de classe. Il a été sévèrement malmené et a vécu un enfer. Sa seule joie était son frère, qui l'aimait, et ses parents, qui le protégeaient… jusqu'à ce que ces cinq monstres tuent sa famille.  
Lorsqu'il perd finalement tout et qu'il affronte le véritable enfer, un sombre "souhait" naît en lui. Il renaît sous l'entraînement de son grand-père, qui a servi dans une unité secrète pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale. Aujourd'hui, quatre ans plus tard, il apparaît devant son ennemi juré.  

"Je ne laisserai personne m'enlever cette vengeance."
description.ja:
人は、殺してもいい？　 　
「別マガ」沸騰の新星・中武士竜が描く、背徳の復讐サスペンス！
「俊、改心した者は見逃せ。人には生まれ変わるチャンスが必要や。」
「じいちゃん、僕は奴らが変わってないことを祈るよ。」
──人ならざる化け物たちを斃すため、少年もまた、人ならざる何かに成った。


“実験体Ａ”と名付けられ、同級生5人から嬲られる日々。小学6年生の漆間俊は、壮絶ないじめに苦しむ「地獄」の中にいた。だが、そこには兄想いの弟と、子を守る父母という「救い」があった。あの日、5人の化け物たちが、鬼畜の所業で家族を奪い去るまでは……。やがて、全てを失い、真の地獄を見た俊の中に暗い「願い」が宿った。戦時中、秘密部隊に所属した祖父の指導の下、生まれ変わる少年。そして4年が経った時、彼は因縁の敵の前に姿を現す……。この復讐は誰にも渡さない。
description.es-la:
**"¿Está bien matar a la gente?"** 
Un traicionero suspenso de venganza de Shiryu Nakatake, un recién llegado a Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

**"Shun, si alguien ha cambiado, déjalo ir y no hagas nada. Hay que darle la oportunidad de renacer".**

**"Abuelo, espero que no se reencarne".** 
Para derrotar a varios monstruos no humanos, el chico también se convirtió en algo no humano.  

Shun Uruma, un estudiante de sexto grado, fue nombrado "Cuerpo experimental: A" por cinco de sus compañeros de clase y sufrió un severo acoso escolar y vivió un infierno. Su única paz era con su hermano, que le quería, y sus padres, que le protegían... . hasta que los cinco monstruos mataron a su familia.  

Cuando finalmente lo pierde todo y se enfrenta al verdadero infierno, un oscuro "deseo" nace dentro de Shun. Renace bajo el entrenamiento de su abuelo, que sirvió en una unidad secreta durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial. Ahora, cuatro años después, se presenta frente a su predestinado enemigo.  

**"No dejaré que NADIE se interponga en mi venganza".**
description.pt-br: "É certo matar pessoas?" - Um suspense de vingança traiçoeira e vil de Shiryu Nakatake, mangaka recém-chegado à revista Bessatsu Shonen. - "Shun, deixe aqueles que mudarem viver. Pessoas precisam de oportunidades pra renascer." "Vovô, eu espero que eles não hajam mudado em nada." Para aniquilar vários monstros desumanos, um garoto também se tornou algo desumano. Shun Uruma, então colegial do sexto ano, foi nomeado de "Cobaia A" por cinco de seus colegas de classe. Severamente intimidado, viveu sob terror. Seu único consolo era seu irmão, que o amava, e seus pais, que o protegiam ... Porém, aqueles cinco monstros mataram até mesmo sua família. Ao perder tudo, ele se vê em um verdadeiro inferno; mas um "desejo" sombrio desperta em Shun. Renascido sob o treinamento de seu avô – que serviu em uma unidade militar secreta durante a II Guerra Mundial – após quatro anos, ele reaparece diante de seus inimigos predestinados. "Eu não vou deixar NINGUÉM tirar essa vingança de mim."

description.en:
A story of a gyaru who picks up a dinosaur.  

---
**Links:**
  
- [Official Site](http://galkyo.com/)
- Alternative Official English - [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/my-roomie-is-a-dino/)

altTitles.vi: Hồ Ly Thời Loạn

description.en: "Stop your evil deeds and take the right path!" That is the creed of Youko Tama and her younger step brother, Jinka Sendou. The two demon siblings travel the country to stop the deeds of all evil doers, along with a scaredy-cat swordsman they picked up along the way, Hyoudou Shinsuke. During their travels, they will come across a monk organization with more than suspicious methods and they'll soon be at war.
description.ja: 時は永禄、戦国時代…。妖狐･たまと仙道･迅火の"義姉弟"が、乱世にはびこる巨悪を討つ！！気鋭･水上悟志が挑む戦国冒険ファンタジー、遂に登場！！！

altTitles.ja-ro: Oira Sukeban

description.en:
His family name is Suke and his given name is Banji, but he's known as Sukeban. Any town the Suke clan settles in just can't contain the violent nature of this family, forcing them to move time and time again. Because of his name, Banji ends up transferring to Amazon School as a female student! However, this situation coupled with Sukeban's rebellious nature undoubtedly will result in mayhem littered with maddening jokes and lewdity.

The manga has been adapted into two live-action films and an OVA.

title.en: Power-Hara Genkai Yuusha, Maougun kara Koutaiguu de Scout sareru ~Yuusha Ranking 1-i na no ni Tedori ga Gomi sugite Seikatsu Dekimasen~

altTitles.ja: パワハラ限界勇者、魔王軍から好待遇でスカウトされる～勇者ランキング１位なのに手取りがゴミ過ぎて生活できません～

description.en:
In this modern age, there are many heroes and demon lords. There was a hero who ranked first in the hero rankings and had the title of "Strongest''. His name is Hero Allen. The strongest hero, who is recognized by everyone, has gained status and honor, and his life is in easy mode...

"That never happened!"

Orders to subjugate the Demon King are issued without a break. Even if you go to great lengths to subjugate a brutal demon lord, you will only receive an amount that even an average man can easily earn, excluding miscellaneous expenses. All expeditions are at my own expense. It's not very bad, but I can't live with it. He then confronts the demon king of destiny. The beautiful female demon lord made a proposal to the dissatisfied hero.

"Hero! Get hired on these conditions!"

The conditions were so favorable, that I was moved.
description.ja:
無数の勇者と魔王が存在する世界で、『最強』の称号を持つ勇者アレン。だが彼は、悩んでいた…
・絶え間ない魔王討伐命令
・王様からのパワハラ
・見合わない報酬

もう、我慢の限界!!

そんな金欠勇者に魔王から救いの手が!? 超好待遇のスカウトにアレンの選択は――

title.en: Kinko no Naka no Naka no Naka

description.en:
When Yuko, just a jack-of-all-trades handywoman, agrees to help her childhood friend Mika crack open an old safe at her family home, she finds herself enveloped in an unsettling atmosphere...

Source: MangaPlus
description.ja: “ただのなんでも屋”の夕子は、幼馴染のミカに頼まれ、彼女の実家の開かずの金庫をこじ開けに行くが、そこには異様な空気が漂っていて…

description.en: Hatori, a high school teacher leading an ordinary life, notices one day that his student, Spica Tsumugi, is being bullied. On a rainy day after school, Hatori finds himself alone with Tsumugi by chance. Hatori tells her, "I'll do something about it!" but Tsumugi gently takes his hand and says with a smile, "Hatori-sensei, you're such a liar." Teacher and student... two people who should not get too close. This somewhat bewitching girl will dramatically change Hatori's ordinary life.
description.ja: 最も無垢で、最も罪深い。世界はこんなヒロインを待っていたーー。

altTitles.ja: となりの席のヤツがそういう目で見てくる

La persona de al lado me mira con esos ojos

altTitles.uk: Однокласниця що сидить біля мене, дивиться на мене хтивими очима

altTitles.en: The weirdo one desk over keeps giving me THAT kind of look

altTitles.ur: Sath ki kursi par beithne wali mujhe "Un Ankhoñ" se deikhti he

description.en: Of course, viewers are excited, but will those being watched feel the same excitement...?
description.ja: 主人公の池沢くんは、同じクラスの美少女・江口さんのことを「そういう目」で見ている。しかし実は、江口さんも「そういう目」で池沢くんのことを見ていて！？チラ見えする筋肉、汗ばむ肌、髪の香り…互いに興味津々な2人の「下心」から始まる純愛ラブコメ！好きな人のなら、臭いも汗も×××も…全部好き。

description.en: Suzuki Aoba, a gloomy, social outcast, is satisfied with his Highschool life though he occasionally gets beaten up by his classmate Iwase Sannosuke in "play-fights". One day, Aoba is saved from a "play-fight" by none other than Akasawa Kenshin, a boy from the class next door and the rising rookie superstar sensation of the MMA world. However, Kenshin wonders aloud if Aoba feels empty when Aoba states that he doesn't have a dream, which Aoba doesn't react to kindly. He vows to land one punch on Kenshin in the future. Aobas joins the Shark Gym lead by the sloppy Kanenari Tokiwa to achieve his dream of besting Kenshin.
description.ja: 日陰者の道を歩んできた主人公・青葉。 譲れぬ“想い”を押し通すため、 総合格闘技“MMA”の世界へ飛び込んでゆく――!!
description.pt-br: Uma história sobre o mal humorado Aoba Suzuki e a estrela em ascensão Kenshin Akasawa moldando seus caminhos para o mundo das lutas de MMA.

altTitles.th: จอมเวทไร้ขีดจำกัด

description.en:
After Sirone was abandoned in a stable, he was found by a family of hunters and raised in a loving home. 

Despite the hardships of the peasant life, he learned how to read from a young age and became obsessed with books, especially ones on the history of magic. One day, he has an unlikely encounter with a mage and learns how to enter the "spirit zone," the first step to learning how to use magic. 

Although they say only nobles can be mages, will Sirone be able to prove his infinite potential?

altTitles.vi: Đảo Hải Tặc
Vua Hải Tặc

description.en:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty-two years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

---

**Note:**  
**Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, English fan translations of One Piece are unable to be posted at this time. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-piece) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US). The three most recent chapters can also be read on MangaPlus for free by clicking the chapter links below.**

---
- **The Best-Selling Manga in History**
- **Won the 41st Japan Cartoonists Association Award Grand Prize alongside Neko Darake in 2012** 
- **Received the Kumamoto Prefecture Honorary Prize in 2018**
description.es: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.ru: Последние слова, произнесённые Королем Пиратов Гол Д. Роджером перед казнью, вдохновили многих выйти в море: «Мои сокровища? Я завещаю их тому, кто сможет их найти. Ищите! Я все оставил в одном месте!». Лишённые сна и покоя люди ринулись на Гранд Лайн, самое опасное место в мире. Так началась великая эра пиратов… Но с каждым годом романтиков становилось все меньше, их постепенно вытесняли прагматичные пираты-разбойники, которым награбленное добро было куда ближе, чем какие-то «никчёмные мечты». Но вот, одним прекрасным днем, семнадцатилетний Монки Д. Луффи исполнил заветную мечту детства - отправился в море. Его цель — ни много, ни мало стать новым Королём Пиратов. За достаточно короткий срок юному капитану удаётся собрать команду, состоящую из не менее амбициозных искателей приключений. И пусть ими движут совершенно разные устремления, главное, этим ребятам важны не столько деньги и слава, сколько куда более ценное – принципы и верность друзьям. И ещё – служение Мечте. Что же, пока по Гранд Лайн плавают такие люди, Великая Эра Пиратов всегда будет с нами!
description.uk:
Король піратів Ґолд Роджер буде страчений Світовим урядом. Прямо перед смертю він підтвердив існування великого скарбу «Ван Піс», який знаходиться десь на величезному морі Ґранд Лайн. Як тільки Роджер сказав, що будь-хто гідний досягти Ван Пісу може забрати його собі, його стратили, і почалася Велика ера піратів.

Двадцять два роки потому, молодий хлопець на ім’я Монкі Д. Луффі готовий почати свою пригоду по пошуку Ван Пісу та здобуванню титулу Короля піратів. Маючи при собі солом’яну шапку, невеличкий човен та еластичне тіло, він вирушає у неймовірну подорож, щоб зібрати собі команду та хороший корабель, який зможе пронести їх через весь Ґранд Лайн, щоб стати найвеличнішими в усіх морях.
description.es-la: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.pt-br: One Piece começa quando Gol D. Roger, o Rei Dos Piratas que possuiu tudo nesse mundo, antes de ser executado, diz que escondeu o seu tesouro em algum lugar da Grand Line, um oceano extremamente perigoso. Desde então muitos piratas se aventuram pela Grand Line para tentar encontrar o tesouro chamado One Piece. Um deles é Monkey D. Luffy, o garoto que, acidentalmente, comeu uma das Akuma No Mi, a Gomu Gomu No Mi (Fruta da Borracha), e agora ele pode esticar seu corpo como se fosse uma borracha. A jornada dele começa atrás de companheiros e um barco, que ele vai conseguindo pouco a pouco, pois tem um objetivo: Ser o Rei Dos Piratas!!

description.en: After leaving a scar on his best friend's face years ago, Tsubaki feels responsible and is determined to grow up big and strong so he can protect Yuu. Yuu is already in high school and Tsubaki is only in elementary, but he is sure that his feelings will get through and Yuu will eventually come to rely on him.

altTitles.ja: みつばものがたり 呪いの少女と死の輪舞《ロンド》

altTitles.ja-ro: Mitsuba Monogatari: Noroi no Shoujo to Shi no Rondo

altTitles.en: Mitsuba's Stories - The Cursed Girl and the Circle-Dance of Death (Rondo)

description.en:
This world revolves around me.

While sleeping in a "deathly" boring dark world, Mitsuba woke up from a long sleep with a mysterious all-powerful feeling, the girl was destined to die, but the magic that was poured into her for 10 years brought the power of a "curse" that should not exist in this world.

Her stepmother, fearing Mitsuba's "death," takes away her aristocratic nature and she is  enrolled n a military academy. However, this was only the beginning of Mitsuba's use of the "curse" to pursue her own path.

The powerful "curse" that resides in a small girl causes a unique tale of otherworldly devastation!

altTitles.vi: Mệnh Danh Thuật Của Bóng Tối

description.en: In the blue and purple neon, under the dense steel sky, the front end of the data torrent is the world after the technological revolution, and it is also the boundary between reality and illusion. Steel and body, past and future. Here, the outer world and the inner world coexist, and everything in front of you is like a wall of time. Darkness gradually shrouded. But you have to understand, my friend, that we cannot deal with darkness with tenderness, but with fire.
description.zh: 蓝与紫的霓虹中，浓密的钢铁苍穹下，数据洪流的前端，是科技革命之后的世界，也是现实与虚幻的分界。 钢铁与身体，过去与未来。 这里，表世界与里世界并存，面前的一切，像是时间之墙近在眼前。 黑暗逐渐笼罩。 可你要明白啊我的朋友，我们不能用温柔去应对黑暗，要用火。

description.en:
This is the story of Kaiman, a guy who does not remember who he was before he was transfigured by a Magic user. 
This transformation left him with a reptile's head, and a desire to find out the truth about who he really is. 
Accompanied by Nikaido, his female companion, he tracks down Magic Users in "The Hole" and unceremoniously 
chomps down on their head, hoping to find out who it was that put him in this state. 
One by one, they witness this "second man" inside the head of Kaiman, and after pulling them back out of his mouth 
he asks them all a question "What did the guy inside my head say?"  


---
description.ru:
В городе, настолько мрачном, что все называют его Дырой, люди живут в постоянном страхе. Воздух и земля пропитаны магическим дымом, и никто уже не удивляется тому, что от выпавшего дождика начнут вдруг прохожие валиться штабелями или городское кладбище превратится в поле битвы людей против зомби. Маги, из-за которых творится вся эта чертовщина, периодически делают вылазки в Дыру и испытывают на жителях свои приёмчики. После одной такой вылазки Никайдо, сборщик трупов, находит огромное бездыханное тело какого-то бедняги с головой крокодила. Кайман (так называет его Никайдо) удаётся выжить, но очнувшись, он понимает, что потерял память. Кайман вместе с Никайдо начинают охоту на магов, чтобы вернуть себе человеческий облик и потерянные воспоминания.  
  


---

**Links:**  
- [Anime Season 1 on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=22562)

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。
description.es-la:
"En este reino, criaturas mitológicas deambulan, descendientes de los nueve cielos que llaman hogar."
Sibuxiang, un hombre-ciervo mitológico y perezoso, es expulsado del cielo y asignado a apoyar a las criaturas mitológicas que vagan por el mundo humano. Conoce y vive aventuras con sus amigos: el enérgico Pixiu amante de la comida llamado Pipi, el fanático conejo lunar Tony, los hermanos ratones Jinjiao y Yinjiao, también desterrados del cielo, y muchos otros. ¿Qué tipo de aventuras emprenderán?

altTitles.vi: Thình Thịch Mỗi Sớm Mai

altTitles.en: They are Still Being Shaken This Morning

description.en: This is your typical story of a boy who's secretly in love with a girl, they both share a 20 minute ride on the commuter train on their way to different schools, will the boy be able to approach the girl and confess his love? And also... What he doesn't know: There's 3 other passengers that secretly support the boy's secret love towards the girl! Read now the hijinks that ensue when the boy tries to approach the girl; from the creator of *[Jitsu wa Watashi wa](https://mangadex.org/title/a990c2a1-b54f-4f4f-986c-3cdab1c9f2f9/)* and *[Yumemi ga Oka Wonderland](https://mangadex.org/title/32bbfefa-8a58-462c-bc9e-e9dd3bd4c152/)*.
description.ja: 午前6時58分舞原行きの通学電車。名前も知らないあの子と僕…とその乗客!? 高校生の男女2人が醸し出す甘酸っぱい雰囲気に、乗客たちが心情駄々洩れで盛り上がる!!
description.pt-br: Esta é a típica história de um garoto que está secretamente apaixonado por uma garota. Ambos compartilham uma viagem de 20 minutos no trem do subúrbio a caminho de escolas diferentes. O garoto será capaz de se aproximar da garota e confessar seu amor? E, além disso... O que ele não sabe: há três outros passageiros que secretamente apoiam o amor secreto do garoto pela garota! Leia agora as confusões que acontecem quando o garoto tenta se aproximar da garota; do criador de *[Jitsu wa Watashi wa](https://mangadex.org/title/a990c2a1-b54f-4f4f-986c-3cdab1c9f2f9/)* e *[Yumemi ga Oka Wonderland](https://mangadex.org/title/32bbfefa-8a58-462c-bc9e-e9dd3bd4c152/)*.

altTitles.en: Honkai Impact 3rd - Escape From The Sky (Book 1001)
Honkai Impact 3rd - When Kiana Play Honkai Impact (Book 1011)

altTitles.ja-ro: Houkai 3rd

description.en:
The definitive source of lore, background, and epic saga of Honkai Impact 3rd, a 3D anime-style ARPG game developed and published by miHoYo.

*History:*
- 1952: 1st Honkai Eruption in Berlin
- 2000: 2nd Honkai Eruption in Siberia
- 2014: Honkai Outbreak in Nagazora

---

Honkai is a corrupting force that manifests itself as supernatural disasters, monstrous creatures, plagues, and Herrschers who can bend physical laws on a whim. Human civilization has been at war with the Honkai since the very beginning. The Valkyries are the mightiest warriors of humanity. They are our only hope.

---

+++ Extraneous information
**Contributor note:** There currently is an ongoing cleanup with the goal of moving each book to it's own title. Help would be appreciated [[Link](https://forums.mangadex.org/threads/honkai-impact-3rd-data-fixing-cleanup.1071951)]

**Volume Guide (by chronological order):**

:- | :- | :- | :-

0.011 | New + Ongoing | Ancient Shenzhou | Blade of the Empyrean

0.2 | Done | 2000 CE. | Second Eruption. !!2000-FEB-01: The entire research staff of Schicksal Babylon Honkai research facility in Siberia disappeared in a single night. Overseer Otto Apocalypse dispatched his 2nd in command Theresa Apocalypse to investigate this mystery. Welt and Einstein of Anti-Entropy, a long-time enemy of Schicksal, prepare for the worst. They suspect the 2nd Eruption is about to happen.!!

To wake their principal, Mei entered the stigma data space to investigate the cause. Meanwhile, Theresa woke up in what appears to be medieval Japan and find herself embroiled in a never-ending Samsara.!!
4 | Done | 2014 CE. | Final Samsara. !!A vengeful entity dwells within Theresa's innate stigma, and she must do what she can to prevent Yae Sakura's will to become forever corrupted by this ancient terror. Can Theresa defeat this monster, or will she lose herself to the endless cycle?!!
5 | Done | 2014 CE. | AE Invasion. !!Anti-Entropy, a long-time enemy of Schicksal, made an attempt to kidnap the 3rd Herrscher - Mei Raiden. Will the Valkyries of St. Freya High defeat the invaders and save each other?!!
6 | Done | 2014 CE. | Moon Shadow. !!Fu Hua and Kiana goes to Singapore to recover a rogue scientist and a stolen gem, unaware of the terrible things that might happen.!!

8 | Done | 2015 CE. | Second Key. !!Schicksal initiated tests on the Second Key they've acquired from the city of London. Durandal didn't expect to find him inside the key.!!
9 | Ongoing | 2005 / 2029 CE. | Alien Space. !!Young Himeko got into Caltech and met a surprisingly young substitute space engineering course lecturer who also happens to share her interest in space aliens.!!

title.en: My New Girlfriend Is Not Human?

altTitles.de: Meine neue Freundin ist kein Mensch?

altTitles.fr: Ma Nouvelle Copine N'est Pas Humaine ?

altTitles.pt-br: Minha nova namorada não é humana?

altTitles.tr: Yeni kız arkadaşım insan değil mi?

altTitles.pl: Moja nowa dziewczyna nie jest człowiekiem?

altTitles.ja: 上杉くんは女の子をやめたい

altTitles.en: Uesugi-kun Wants to Quit Being a Girl

description.en: Uesugi-kun is a boy who's as petite and cute as a girl. He has a crush on a girl he's known since childhood, but overheard her saying, "Wouldn't Uesugi be totally adorable if he was a girl?!" Uesugi-kun's not as tall as his other childhood friend, Eito, nor is he as good at studies, and now he's suffering from a broken heart. A depressed Uesugi-kun stops by a shrine while running an errand and makes a wish...
description.ja:
可愛すぎる女体化男子の恋の行方は――！？

上杉ケースケの悩みは男子なのに小さくて可愛いこと。ある日、片想いの相手・のえるが「上杉が女の子だったらめっちゃ可愛くない!？」と話しているのを聞いてしまう。

「オレ、男扱いもされてないってこと…!？」

幼なじみで何でもできる瑛人には、身長も勉強も勝てないし、失恋もしちゃうし…。落ち込むケースケが、家の隣の神社で恋がかなうようにお願いをしてみると、身体が女の子になっちゃって――!?

altTitles.th: เพื่อนเกรียนข้างโต๊ะ

altTitles.ja-ro: Tonari no Seki-kun

altTitles.es: Seki-kun, mi compañero de al lado

description.en:
The boy who sits next to Yokoi in class, Seki-kun, is always up to something at his desk. He manages to somehow play very elaborate games without attracting the teacher's attention. From dominoes, to shogi, to go, to mecha models, to playing with cats and more, he always has something new to do. Yokoi often finds herself getting reluctantly interested in his games, even though they always seem to end up getting HER in trouble with the teacher!  
  
[See AnimeNewsNetwork for the anime.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=15587)  
[See AnimeNewsNetwork for the live action show.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2015-05-27/tonari-no-seki-kun-rumi-phenomenon-school-comedies-get-live-action-show/.88620)

altTitles.ja-ro: Adashima

description.en: In the middle of the school day, on the second floor of the gym. This is where the two came to skip class, and it's where their friendship began. A story of two high school girls, playing ping-pong and chatting as they spend the heydays of their youth.
description.ja: 入間人間が書く電撃文庫の大人気作品『安達としまむら』。TVアニメ化決定の本作を新鋭・柚原もけがコミカライズ！女子校生2人のゆる～い日常をご堪能ください。
description.ru: В середине учебного дня, на втором этаже спортзала. Именно туда эти двое пришли пропустить занятия, и именно там началась их дружба.

description.en:
Succubi, a species that uses humans as seedbeds to reproduce, and humanity, which is set on the eradication of every single succubus. As the unrelenting war between these two incompatible groups wages on, a “king” who will bring about the end of the war is born. The one chosen for the role of king is…?! (K MANGA)
___
**Official English:** [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10588/episode/356799) - United States, Japan, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, & Singapore only.
description.ja: 人類を苗床に繁殖する種族「サキュバス」と、彼らを根絶しようとする人類。相容れない2つの種族が闘争を始めて悠久の時が流れた頃、戦いを終わらせる「王」が誕生する。王に選ばれた勝者は果たして……!?

altTitles.ja: ナカ●シ姉妹のヘン●イ記録

altTitles.ja-ro: Naka__shi Shimai no Hen__i Kiroku

description.en: The story follows Niido Akiho, an 18-year-old college student leading a fulfilling life, except for her unemployed sister, Kana, who is staying with her. Akiho struggles to manage her sister's untidy habits. Their situation takes a turn when Chifusa, a busty woman identifying herself as a "debt collectors," visits them. She informs Akiho that Kana has accumulated a debt of 3 million yen. Unable to repay the debt, Chifusa offers them a "Problematic Part-Time Job" in exchange for a high pay. The job's details remain confidential, leading to a slightly erotic work comedy about two sisters entangled in a peculiar debt.
description.ja: 華の女子大生・仁井戸秋歩は一人暮らしを始めて充実した生活を送っていた――ニートの姉・夏奈が居候していることを除いては。だらしのない姉に手を焼く日々を過ごしていたところ、突然、「おちんぎん搾り取り役」を称する爆乳女性・千房が訪ねてくる。開口一番に告げられたのは、なんと夏奈が作った借金300万円の返済請求だった！ 返す当てもなく困り果てる二人に千房が提示した条件は、「ワケアリバイト」。高報酬の代わりに「ワケアリ」な内容とのことだが……？

"Fulfilling meal…a familiar view.”

In this story, Fate and food meet in a delicious and gentle world. It’s nothing but an ordinary meal scene… Delicious meals are served at the Emiya’s dinner table every day, through spring, summer, fall and winter. – Let's see… what's for dinner today?

description.en:
Rishe, the daughter of a duke, is stuck in a time loop that begins at the moment her engagement is annulled and ends with her early demise at the age of 20. She has now begun her seventh loop.  
  
In her past do-overs, Rishe experienced various occupations, including being a merchant, a pharmacist, and a knight. But this time around, she simply wishes to live a long and leisurely life!  
  
That *was* the plan, only for it to be derailed by an unprecedented marriage proposal from her killer in the previous loop, the neighbouring country's Crown Prince—?!  


---

- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1784ga/)
description.id: Rishe, seorang putri dari bangsawan, terjebak dalam putaran waktu yang dimulai sesaat setelah pertunangannya dibatalkan, dan berakhir saat kematiannya di awal usia 20 tahun. sekarang dirinya memulai putaran waktu yang ke tujuh kalinya. Di kehidupan sebelumnya, Rishe menjalani berbagai macam pekerjaan, termasuk bekerja menjadi pedagang, apoteker, dan seorang kesatria. Tetapi pada kali ini, dia hanya mengharapkan kehidupan panjang dan waktu yang luang! Itu adalah rencananya, hanya untuk tergelincir dalam tunangan yang belum pernah terjadi dari seseorang yang membunuhnya pada putaran waktu yang sebelumnya, Putra mahkota dari negeri tetangga-?!
description.ja:
公爵令嬢リーシェの人生には大きな秘密があった――。 
それは“20歳で命を落としては婚約破棄の瞬間に戻ってしまう”こと。 

これまで商人や薬師、侍女などそれぞれで充実した時間を満喫したが７回目の今度の人生は、違った決意に満ちていた。 

「今度こそ長生きをしてゴロゴロした生活を送りたい！」 

だが、実行に移すべく城を飛び出そうとした矢先、皇国ガルクハインの皇太子アルノルトと邂逅を果たす。 

彼こそ“騎士”だった前世でリーシェを殺害した張本人だった！ 
さらに、妙に気に入られ結婚まで申し込まれてしまい――!? 
ゴロゴロしたい決意とは裏腹に、波瀾万丈な７回目の人生が始まる。

description.en:
Usato, an ordinary high schooler, happens to run into two fellow students after school one rainy day. Suddenly, all three of them are engulfed in a magic circle and transported to a fantasy world. There’s just one tiny problem — Usato is simply dragged along by accident!  On top of that, Usato learns that he is capable of using healing magic — an incredibly rare affinity in this new world.

Now Usato must spend his days with the rescue team thugs, struggling through their hellish training regimen — learning the wrong way to use healing magic.

Get ready for an eccentric otherworld fantasy filled with comedy and combat!
description.ja:
**最前線を駆けるのは、常識破りの回復要員！？**

平凡な高校生のウサトは、同じ学校のスズネ、カズキと共に異世界へと転移してしまう。 三人は魔王軍から王国を救うための『勇者』として喚び出された――が、 勇者としての適性を持つのはスズネとカズキだけ。ウサトはただ巻き込まれただけだった！ しかし、ウサトにレア属性の『治癒魔法使い』の素養が見つかったことで事態は一変し…！？ 「小説家になろう」発！　ギャグありバトルありのドタバタ異世界ファンタジー！
description.pt: Usato Ken é um estudante normal do segundo ano do ensino médio. Em um certo dia chuvoso, as duas pessoas mais admiradas do conselho estudantil, Inukami Suzune e Ryuusen Kazuki, percebem que ele não tem um guarda-chuva, então Kazuki empresta o seu para ele. Depois eles acabam conversando enquanto vão embora juntos, mas de repente são convocados para outro mundo como heróis. Parece que Ken foi arrastado pela invocação por acaso, mas ele não pode voltar para a Terra. O que ele fará? Será que vai chorar pelo cantos ou vai agir?
description.ru: Одним дождливым осенним днём жизнь абсолютно заурядного ученика старшей школы Усато Кена перевернулась с ног на голову: вместе с двумя членами школьного совета – президентом Инуками Судзунэ и вице-президентом Рюунзэном Кадзуки Усато-куна призвали в другой мир! После проверки магических способностей наш герой оказывается целителем и попадает в отряд спасателей, командир которого отличается крайне нестандартными методами подготовки…
description.vi: Trong một ngày mưa tầm tã, một học sinh trung học không có bất kỳ tài năng đặc biệt nào, Usato Ken, bị kéo theo một cuộc triệu hồi đến thế giới khác cùng hai người khác, một anh chàng đẹp trai và một cô gái xinh đẹp mà cậu mới làm quen. Cậu bị ép tham gia một khóa đào tạo địa ngục vì khả năng của mình như một healer
description.pt-br: Usato Ken é um estudante normal do segundo ano do ensino médio. Em um certo dia chuvoso, as duas pessoas mais admiradas do conselho estudantil, Inukami Suzune e Ryuusen Kazuki, percebem que ele não tem um guarda-chuva, então Kazuki empresta o seu para ele. Parece que Ken foi arrastado pela invocação por acaso, mas ele não pode voltar para a Terra. O que ele fará? Será que vai chorar pelo cantos ou vai agir?

description.en:
Misato-san, a very beautiful office lady who is good at her job, and her boss—Konishikawa-san, a middle-aged man who spoils his subordinates. Misato-san has a strict attitude toward Konishikawa-san, but what are the hidden feelings behind it?! The gap between the seriousness and cuteness will make you faint in anxiety, and this office love comedy with a difference in age begins! (MTL)

---

description.ja: 仕事ができて超美人OLの三郷さんと、部下に甘いおじさん上司の小西川さん。三郷さんは小西川さんに対して厳しい態度で接するが、そこに隠された想いとは…！？ 厳しさと可愛さのギャップに悶絶する、年の差オフィスラブコメディー開幕！！

description.en:
Gaile, a Cursificer, is left penniless when he's expelled from his party as soon as they reach S Rank. Apparently he wasn't contributing enough?! But they hadn't realized that his cursed items outperform even holy relics and legendary equipment!

Gaile decides to try to make a living on his own off of his cursed items.
description.ja:
【呪具師】のゲイルは大して貢献していないと、パーティがＳランクに昇格したと同時に無一文で追い出される。しかし、彼らは理解していなかった。ゲイルの作る呪具は、そこらの聖遺物や勇者の装備をも凌駕する性能を誇っていたことに…。ゲイルは呪具を活かして一人で生きていこうと決意しーー。

風変わりな職業・呪具師の大活躍が新感覚の爽快感で大反響!!
description.vi: Gaile, một nguyền cụ sư tài năng, đã bị các đồng đội phản bội khi tổ đội đạt được hạng S. Họ không ngờ ràng các nguyền cụ của anh ta còn mạnh hơn cả thánh tích và các trang bị thần thoại. Sau khi bị đuổi khỏi tổ đội, Gaile quyết định tự mình kiếm sống bằng những nguyền cụ do mình tạo ra. Chuyến phiêu lưu của anh chàng nguyền cụ sư chính thức bắt đầu.
description.pt-br:
A versão mangá de um dos romances de fantasia isekai mais populares de Shousetsuka ni Narou!

Gaile, um Cursificer, fica sem um tostão quando é expulso de seu grupo assim que chegam ao Rank S. Aparentemente ele não estava contribuindo o suficiente?! Mas eles não tinham percebido que seus itens amaldiçoados superam até mesmo relíquias sagradas e equipamentos lendários!

Gaile decide tentar ganhar a vida por conta própria com seus itens amaldiçoados.

description.en:
The ninth story arc of Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure. 

O’ahu, present day. Dua Lipa is the trending musician, and COVID is still a major concern. On this island lives a 15-year-old boy named Jodio Joestar. Living with his brother and mother, he acts as a dealer for certain illegal substances. One day, his employer comes and shows him an excellent find: a Japanese person has landed in Hawaii with a diamond worth over six million dollars. Normally it would be impossible to steal, but for someone with a stand…

This is a story of a young boy and his quest to become rich.
description.hu:
Ez a Jojo's Bizarre Adventure kilencedik történetíve.

O'ahu, napjainkban. Dua Lipa a trendi előadó és a COVID még mindig a fő gond. Ezen a szigeten él egy 15 éves srác, Jodio Joestar. Bátyával és édesanyjával él, dílerként dolgozik és bizonyos illegális anyagokat árul. Egy nap, a főnöke mutat neki egy kiválló fogást: egy japán személy Hawaiira érkezett egy hat millió dollárt érő gyémánttal. Normális esetben lehetetlen lenne ellopni, de akinek standje van...

Ez egy fiatal fiú és az ő küldetésének a története, hogy gazdag legyen.
description.it: O'ahu, oggi. Dua Lipa è la musicista di tendenza e il COVID è ancora una delle principali preoccupazioni. Su quest'isola vive un ragazzo di 15 anni di nome Jodio Joestar. Vive con il fratello e la madre e fa lo spacciatore di alcune sostanze illegali. Un giorno, il suo datore di lavoro arriva e gli mostra un'eccellente scoperta: un giapponese è sbarcato alle Hawaii con un diamante del valore di oltre sei milioni di dollari. Normalmente sarebbe impossibile da rubare, ma per qualcuno con una posizione... Questa è la storia di un ragazzo e della sua ricerca della ricchezza.
description.uk:
Дев’ята сюжетна арка «Неймовірних пригод Джоджо». Оаху, теперішній час. Дуа Ліпа – популярна музикантка, а COVID-19 досі викликає серйозне занепокоєння. На цьому острові мешкає 15-річний хлопчик на ім'я Джодіо Джостар. Живе з братом і матір'ю, торгує певними забороненими речовинами. Одного разу його бос прийшов до нього і показав неймовірну знахідку: японець висадився на Гаваях з діамантом вартістю понад шість мільйонів доларів! Зазвичай, вкрасти таку коштовність було б неможливо, але для того, хто має стенд… 
Це історія про молодого хлопця та його прагнення розбагатіти.
description.es-la: Cierto japonés ingresó a la isla de Hawái con un diamante de valor de 6 millones de dólares. En la isla de Oahu vive un chico llamado Jodio Joestar, cuya meta es arrebatar el diamante de las manos de esa persona. Junto a sus asociados, irán a la quinta de esa persona. Sin embargo, ¿Qué misterios les esperan?

description.en:
"Ah… Ahhhhhhhhhhh!"  
  
The one who's become the Crown Prince's fiancée is the Duke's daughter Serea, but during their first meeting, she screamed and collapsed! Had she remembered something from her previous life? Are you an evil villainess? Am I going to break you if I fool around too much? A me that's programmed to be like that, is so horrible. Isn't that right~ An "event" and those "program settings" have no connection to me though. Let's go back to my place and I'll slowly and sweetly make you fall desperately in love with me!  
  
This otome game's villainess is going to follow a harsh path, and will fight to change her fate.
___
**Character Designer:** [Nardack](https://mangadex.org/author/f27853e1-c9b2-442a-a8f8-ca3962078222)

All dark elves have gone extinct, except for a little boy who grows up among white elves. His name is Caim. After the great war between elves, is Caim convicted to have a difficult life, since almost everyone hates him and wishes for his demise? One day his teacher tells him of a place called Joker. There everyone lives in co-existence, no matter who they are.

Caim now has a place to dream of, and surprisingly another boy befriends him. A boy who doesn't care about Caim's darker skin tone. But will the friendship last all the way to the mysterious place called Joker?

altTitles.en: I See Your Face, Turned Away

description.en: Hikari's your typical freshmen in high school who's been recently daydreaming about Mari’s, her shy best friend, a love story. She decides to ship Mari with Ootani-kun, their classmate, after finding out about his crush on Mari when his friend, Asagiri-kun, tried getting the two to talk. The main character is Mari, the leading man is Ootani, and Hikari is the typical best friend in the story. Not bad… right? A youthful story between four kids going through unrequited love.
description.fr:
Nous suivons le quotidien de quatre lycéens, deux filles et deux garçons, sur leur amitié parfois compliquée et leur amour non-partagé.

Hikari et Mari sont deux lycéennes qui s'entendent bien et qui sont amies. Hikari est une jeune fille plutôt banale et assez transparente alors que Mari est lumineuse. Elles se rapprochent petit à petit de Otani, un garçon bruyant et populaire et de son ami, Asagari, qui est plus calme et posé.
description.pt-br: Hikari é a típica caloura do ensino médio que recentemente sonhou acordada com a história de amor de Mari, sua tímida melhor amiga. Ela decide shippar Mari com Ootani-kun, seu colega de classe, depois de descobrir sobre sua paixão por Mari quando seu amigo, Asagiri-kun, tentou fazer os dois conversarem. A personagem principal é Mari, o protagonista é Ootani e Hikari é a típica melhor amiga da história. Nada mal... certo? Uma história juvenil entre quatro crianças passando por um amor não correspondido.

description.en:
Mari is a high school student living in a town where beastmen and humans coexist. When she is late for school, she meets Tsunagu, a beastman who has come to the school as a "special student" for the Beastman Education Program, at the front gate. Mari is bewildered by her first contact with a beastman, but as she gets to know him, she is drawn to his kind and pure side. However, some of her classmates don't seem to take kindly to beastmen, and suddenly the two of them are locked in a warehouse. Suddenly, they are locked in a warehouse and Tsunagu hugs her! He says, "You smell sweet..." His breathing becomes ragged.

A human and a beastman. What will happen to the love between two people who transcend race?
Pure and exciting interspecies youth love.
A romance about two stubborn people that like each other.

description.en:
Gundam EXA VS (ガンダム EXA VS) is a manga written by Tomohiro Chiba and illustrated by Kōichi Tokita, published by Kadokawa Shoten and serialized in Gundam Ace magazine in 2014 to be tied in with the arcade Game Mobile Suit Gundam: Extreme Vs. Maxi Boost. It's the sequel to the previous manga series, Gundam EXA.

Some time after the events of Gundam EXA, Sthesia Awar informs Leos Alloy that she discovered a new GA data cluster from a computer outside of Jupiter X. The two dive into the new data and find themselves in the Universal Century, during the attack on Side 7. However, after entering the colony, they find that the inside was in ruins, and the RX-78-02 Gundam has been destroyed before it could be activated by Amuro Ray.

altTitles.en: The Bisque Doll Is Falling in Love
The Bisque Doll Falls in Love

description.en: Wakana Gojou is a fifteen year old high-school boy who was socially traumatized in the past due to his passions. That incident left a mark on him that made him into a social recluse. Until one day he had an encounter with Kitagawa who is a sociable gyaru, who is the complete opposite of him. They soon share their passions with one another which leads to their odd relationship.
description.fr:
Wakana Gojo est un lycéen solitaire. Son rêve est de devenir artisan et de fabriquer les poupées traditionnelles pour le Hina Matsuri. Mais comme cette passion n’est pas très virile, il la cache et ne se fait pas remarquer. Jusqu’au jour ou Marine Kitagawa, la fille la plus populaire du lycée, le voit se servir d’une machine à coudre ! Contre toute attente elle lui demande de devenir son couturier pour réaliser… des tenues de cosplay !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.tr: Wakana Gojou, vadesi geçmiş tutkuları nedeniyle toplumsal travmaları olan 15 yaşında bir liselidir. Bu olayın bıraktığı iz onu toplumdan uzak biri haline getirdi. Bir gün kendisinin tam zıttı, arkadaş canlısı bir gal olan Kitagawa ile karşılaşır. Kısa zamanda garip ilişkilerini yönlendiren tutkularını paylaşırlar.
description.uk:
Вакана Ґоджьо — п’ятнадцятилітній учень старшої школи, в минулому отримав серйозну психологічну травму на фоні свого захоплення. Внаслідок чого хлопець ізолював себе від соціуму і почав вести затворницький образ життя.
Так було би і на далі, але в життя Ґоджьо буквально увірвалась Кітаґава — дружелюбна і комунікабельна дівчина, повна його протилежність. Досить швидко вони розділили хоббі один одного, що і привело до їх досить дивних, але міцних відносин.
description.vi: Wakana Gojou 15 tuổi là 1 học sinh cao trung từng bị tổn thương tâm lý trong quá khứ do sở thích kỳ lạ của mình. Chuyện đó đã khiến cậu trở nên nhút nhát, rụt rè. Cho tới ngày nọ Gojou tình cờ gặp Kitagawa – một Gyaru – người có tính cách trái ngược hoàn toàn với cậu ấy. 2 người họ hóa ra đều có những điểm chung và đã tạo thành một mối quan hệ hài hước
description.es-la: Wakana Gojou es un joven de quince años de edad que se vio traumatizado socialmente en el pasado debido a sus pasiones. Ese incidente le dejó una marca que lo convirtió en un recluso social. Hasta que un día tuvo un encuentro con Kitagawa, una gyaru sociable, que es todo lo contrario a él. Pronto comparten sus pasiones entre sí, lo que da lugar a su extraña relación.
description.pt-br: Wakana Gojou é um garoto de quinze anos que foi socialmente traumatizado no passado devido a suas paixões. Aquele incidente deixou uma marca nele que o fez ser um recluso social. Até que um dia ele teve um encontro com Kitagawa, que é um gyaru sociável, que é o completo oposto dele. Eles logo compartilham suas paixões uns com os outros, o que leva a um relacionamento estranho.
